task.title: Getting updates from the remote repository

abstract.shortdesc: When other writers on your team publish their changes remotely, the branch you checked out locally can quickly become out-of-date. To pull the latest updates from the upstream branch, use the Pull action in the view toolbar.
abstract.p: The add-on supports pulling from remote branches using either the pull and merge or the pull and rebase strategy. The default pull strategy is pull and merge.

prereq.p: Make sure that the current working copy is set to an initialized repository.

step.cmd: In the the view toolbar, perform one of the following actions:

choices.choice: To pull from the upstream branch using the default strategy, click the Pull icon.
To choose the pull strategy, click the down arrow next to the Pull icon and select either Pull (merge) or Pull (rebase).
